# Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.ResponsiveNavigation

This package provides responsive navigation controls for TwinCAT HMI applications.

## Usage

Add `Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.ResponsiveNavigation` to your TwinCAT HMI project to enable adaptive and user-friendly navigation elements that work seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes.

## Documentation

For detailed usage and configuration, refer to the [Beckhoff TwinCAT HMI documentation](https://infosys.beckhoff.de/content/1033/te2000_tc3_hmi_engineering/index.html).
